trends: There have been 5 other sightings in Peekskill
There were no other sightings in Peekskill on or around April 4th 2010
divs: sighting detailsmyself and a friend where sitting on the deck watching the first yankee\ boston game when i noticed an orange light in the sky to the west. i pointed it out to my friend as it approached when it started its turn to the south we both got up and walked to the front of the house to track which way it was going and watched it disappear in the distance to the south. granted there is a lot of air traffic in the area but as the light approached it was bright orange as it turned and moved away the color and shape did not change in color or intensity. additionally, there was no evidence of strobe maker lights normally associated with aircraft.
Summary: saw an orange light approach from the west then turning gradually to the south and disappearing in the distance.
